lines.text: Cody, Cody, Cody. I understand you're a private investigator.
And we want to know if you'll investigate our privates.
Mmm hmm.
Did you hear that she got raped this afternoon by two homosexuals? One held her down and the other one did her hair.
Thanks a lot, I enjoyed it.
Damn you, Shane, you son of a bitch!
Cody, do you cook?
Not much.
Well, what do you usually make for dinner?
Reservations.
[last lines]
Would I help any woman in distress? Yes, ma'am, I would.
Oh, Cody Abilene. My Abilene.
I do wish Luciana hadn't killed Shane. It's such an inconvenience. Good help is so very hard to find, you know.
All right everybody, this party's over!
We're in big trouble.
No shit, Kemo Sabe.
You don't understand. I only have one bullet left and I've never hit a moving target in my life. Here he comes.

[Stands up and exposes her breasts]
Hey, look at these!

[Stops and stares]
Yeah!
[Cody shoots Luke]
We need this film developed.
Sure, no problem.
Oh, by the way, it doesn't have to be good. Just fast.
Fast, not good. Huh. Sounds like most men I know.
All right, it's these hands. They're the lethal weapons.
Yeah, just be careful when you play with yourself.
